post.author: Oneofthe8devilz
post.body:
High Quality Streamable Video Link:
http://www.556mmfmj.com/public/streamab ... ootage.wmv (109 MB)

etqw 23rd century warfare pre alpha footage

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
For only played ETQW as a demo for 30mn max, i don't get what you did with your mod by looking this vid...
(looking at you shooting the sand and driving is not explicit)

Could you add more infos please?

post.author: Kristus
post.body: As far as I could see, he was demonstrating that the weapons had dynamic lights now.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: i think the lights on the weapons should be smaller. it makes the ground pretty bight.

post.author: Oneofthe8devilz
post.body:
1. ported the FMJ map "de_delta" to etqw for testing purposes and in order to get familiar with the new tools....

2. everything is dynamically and unified lit in this showcase (unlike the megatextures in stock etqw which only do a diffusemap pass...

3. All weapons now spawn dynamic lights on discharge in first and third person and the weapon ballistics have been tweaked..

4. Added a custom atmosphere for the showcase map....

Man... sometimes I wish people would talk less and mod more, then the world would certainly be a better place.....

I did this setup in order to see if I am going to ditch etqw 23rd century warfare from the SPS roadmap list or not......

viewtopic.php?f=39&t=21883

......but it seems that I like the capabilities of the mod tools so far.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
Oneofthe8devilz wrote:
1. ported the FMJ map "de_delta" to etqw for testing purposes and in order to get familiar with the new tools....


I'd love to see at war, blade runner & an expanded gowbars ported to et:qw. Love gowbars, my fav map.
